importSection.selectedFileValid: Selected file is valid for proceed the import action.
importSection.selectedFileNotValid: Validation failed, check your excel file columns titles and try re-import.

importSection.longTimeWaitMessageForUpload: Please be patient, import progress takes some time to progressed.

paginationDisabled: Save your changes or cancel it to back paginate.
lockModeRestriction: You cannot do any lock or unlock for this row because it's archived !

lockMechanism.title: Row Lock Action
lockMechanism.100: This row was locked by me at {time}
lockMechanism.110: This row was locked by {uname} at {time}
lockMechanism.120: This row is reserved by {uname}, nobody can do manipulation on this row at the moment.

unlockMechanism.title: Row Unlock Action
unlockMechanism.200: This row was unlocked by me at {time}
unlockMechanism.210: This row was locked by {uname} at {time}. You can not unlock. Please contact with user.
unlockMechanism.220: This row doesn't have any lock information!
unlockMechanism.230: This row explicitly locked by {uname} at {time}. If you want to unlock, please use explicit unlock button on toolbar!

radioSiteExistsWithSameNameText: Radio site is exists, if you continue new revision will be created.
